title: Au contraire
author: VD
content_html:
Pretty Lady sees a mismatch:

Sweetie, I am terribly disappointed. It is unworthy of you to be shooting fish in a barrel–hardly what I would expect of a chivalrous gentleman like you. Little Miss Sally is undoubtedly about eighteen years old and from a broken home. I imagine she will be a much nicer girl once she has settled down a bit.

One can only respond to those who first present themselves. I have said before that I’m pleased to take on any critic, regardless of their supposed status. And one can’t take on a feminist on feminism – even a feminist who can spell and write grammatically correct sentences – without it looking like shooting fish in a barrel. The recent MacKinnon-related post should suffice to demonstrate that.

As for Sally, she was quite literally asking for it. And when a girl asks to be pounded, why, what chivalrous gentleman would force her to make do with soft and timid caresses?

And one can’t take on a feminist on feminism – even a feminist who can spell and write grammatically correct sentences – without it looking like shooting fish in a barrel.
